"The": A party where guests are asked to wear all black clothing and decorations to blend in with the dark surroundings, creating an invisible party atmosphere. Guests can also wear black masks to further enhance the illusion.
"The Silent Cele": A party where guests are encouraged to communicate only through sign language, creating a unique and challenging way to celebrate the birthday.

"The Dark Side": A party where guests are encouraged to dress up as their darker side or alter ego, creating a mysterious and intriguing atmosphere.
